articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary from day one of the PGA Championship at the Quail Hollow Club in Charlotte, North Carolina.
articles.title: US PGA Championship LIVE: Day 1 leaderboard, tee-times, scores, radio & updates from Quail Hollow

articles.description: Marcus Rashford believes Manchester United would be prepared to sell him for £40m to anyone, not just Aston Villa.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Forward believes Manchester United would be prepared to sell him for £40m

articles.description: Liverpool are ready to trigger Bayer Leverkusen star Jeremie Frimpong's release clause as they close in on their first signing of the summer.
articles.title: Jeremie Frimpong: Liverpool ready to trigger Bayer Leverkusen star's release clause

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe and his former club Paris St-Germain are embroiled in a legal dispute, but a verdict will soon be reached.
articles.title: Why are PSG and Kylian Mbappe facing each other in court?

articles.description: George Russell says the back-and-forth controversy over punishing Formula 1 drivers for swearing is "all a bit suspect".
articles.title: George Russell: Mercedes driver says F1 swearing controversy 'a bit suspect'

articles.description: Tottenham captain Son Heung-min files a criminal complaint with the South Korean police for being the victim of an alleged blackmail plot.
articles.title: Tottenham: Son Heung-min files criminal complaint over alleged blackmail plot

articles.description: Former Giro d'Italia champion Jai Hindley is out of stage six of the Giro d'Italia after he was involved in a mass crash which saw several competitors unseated.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia: Former champion Jai Hindley out of stage six after mass crash

articles.description: Italy's Jasmine Paolini shakes off a slow start to beat American Peyton Stearns and reach the final of the Italian Open.
articles.title: Italian Open: Jasmine Paolini beats Peyton Stearns to reach Rome WTA final

articles.description: Jos Buttler will miss the Indian Premier League play-offs if Gujarat Titans qualify so he can play a full part in England's white-ball series against West Indies.
articles.title: IPL 2025: Jos Buttler to skip play-offs and return for England v West Indies series

articles.description: Former South Africa international Cornal Hendricks dies aged 37 after suffering a heart attack.
articles.title: Former South Africa winger Cornal Hendricks dies aged 37
